Synopsis: This function returns the first X characters of a given text string.
Description: The Format-FirstXChars function takes a text string and a number of characters as input and returns the first X characters of the text string.
Notes: This function is useful for truncating long text strings to a specific length.

Examples.Title: EXAMPLE 1
Examples.Code:
Format-FirstXChars -Text "VERBOSE: Loading module from path 'C:\Users\pklys\.vscode\extensions\ms-vs" -NumberChars 15
# Returns: VERBOSE: Loading
